# button-component



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Type                                                                                                                          | Default      |
| --------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------ |
| `compact` | `compact` | Whether to apply compact mode to the button. Default value is set to false                                                                                                                                                                   | `boolean`                                                                                                                     | `false`      |
| `fdmenu`  | `fdmenu`  | Whether to apply menu mode to the button. Default value is set to false                                                                                                                                                                      | `boolean`                                                                                                                     | `false`      |
| `fdtype`  | `fdtype`  | The type of the button. Types include: 'standard' \| 'positive' \| 'negative' \| 'attention' \| 'half' \| 'ghost' \| 'transparent' \| 'emphasized' \| 'menu'. Leave empty for default (Standard button).' Default value is set to 'standard' | `"" \| "attention" \| "emphasized" \| "ghost" \| "half" \| "menu" \| "negative" \| "positive" \| "standard" \| "transparent"` | `'standard'` |
| `glyph`   | `glyph`   | The icon to include in the button. See the icon page for the list of icons. Setter is used to control when css class have to be rebuilt. Default value is set to ''.                                                                         | `string`                                                                                                                      | `''`         |
| `label`   | `label`   | Text rendered inside button component                                                                                                                                                                                                        | `string`                                                                                                                      | `undefined`  |
| `type`    | `type`    | Native type of button element                                                                                                                                                                                                                | `string`                                                                                                                      | `'button'`   |
